name: Musou Isshin
description:
Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1 this Round.
The character to which this is attached has their Physical DMG converted to Electro DMG.
After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill: Other characters on your side gain 2 Energy.
descriptionraw: Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1 this Round.\nThe character to which this is attached has their $[K100] converted to $[K104].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill:</color> Other characters on your side gain 2 $[K310].
descriptionreplaced: Each stack increases the ATK of the character to which this is attached by 1 this Round.\nThe character to which this is attached has their {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character to which this is attached uses a Skill:</color> Other characters on your side gain 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>.
